title: Tomboy
description: Recorded at his studio in Lisbon,
sees Animal Collective member Noah Lennox stepping away from the sample-based parameters of his previous record,

, and incorporating more guitar and synthesizer. The record, massive in its span of emotion, genre, and sound, is the welcome return of one of the most prolific and consistent audio pioneers in recent memory.
